Name: A Small Robot Story
About the game: A Small Robot Story is an adventure-platformer where you play as Rae, a small robot who activates and has no idea why. So you need to set out and find out what's up! With a heavy emphasis on story, A Small Robot Story will take you through forests, factories, caves, laboratories, and more as you track down and find the source of your sudden activation. Power-ups NES-styled challenging gameplay Detailed story delivered through rpg-style dialogues and cut scenes Gamepad support Original chiptune soundtrack
